channel.title: Question about the box where you enter username and pass
channel.description: Well... On the Client I'm using there is a "Change Server" under where you enter your password I removed the text, but if you press enter a few times you still can change it. I've tried a few things, but none of them seem to work. What should I search for to remove it completely? (Sorry if it's a "Spoonfeed" but it's just a question for future reference, + I'm a newb to Clients...)

item.title: Question about the box where you enter username and pass
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Nathan R:

Wtf @ your username.

Lol can you help though?

Read full topic

item.title: Question about the box where you enter username and pass

@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Well… On the Client I’m using there is a “Change Server” under where you enter your password
I removed the text, but if you press enter a few times you still can change it. I’ve tried a few things, but none of them seem to work.
What should I search for to remove it completely? (Sorry if it’s a “Spoonfeed” but it’s just a question for future reference, + I’m a newb to Clients…)
